summary: I made my character into a simple Companion
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new simple companion, Freya.

Combat type : Archer
Inventory : Hunting bow and 100 Steel Arrows
Magic :Healing

Location : Whiterun Bannered Mare

Her standard outfit is the Tavern Clothing, so she should wear anything you give her.

I havent tested her much yet, so please tell me if everythings working fine or if you have problems and I will try to help.

- Installation -

Extract the files in your skyrim main folder.

Requirements:
-Apachii Sky Hair  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
-Coverwomen (I recommend look 4)  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
author: Ogractor
